148  class u8char_error: public exception {};
149 
152  class u8char_index_error: public u8char_error {
153  const char* what() const throw() {
154  return "Invalid byte index.";
155  }
156  };
157 
160  class u8char_format_error: public u8char_error {
161  const char* what() const throw() {
162  return "UTF-8 format error.";
163  }
164  };
